reviews.review: 挺刺激的，真的是有人皇朋友带着玩，到后来才开始不那么害怕屠夫，之前玩的吓得头发都飞了，现在才敢和屠夫溜溜弯，感谢各位放过我的屠夫大大
Конечно, рекомендую. В игре очень разнообразный гемплей. Много говна и веселые пробития палет, окон и так до бесконечности. Еще в игре существую телепотрирования и баги...

Is this game worth trying? Yes. Is it worth buying? Definitely no. It is nice for sure on a free weekend to play like once or twice per couple months but without a free weekend it's full of toxic tryhards that makes it unplayable. Game based on quick time event got no option to disable Vsync in options. The progression system is a mix of RNG and shitload of grind. They added a fucking battle pass aswell instead of balancing the game at least a bit. So just skip it. The idea is great and unique but they fucked every possible thing. Waiting for a game that would be working and at least a bit balanced.

The game is a fun time killer with pretty short game intervals.

Newbies might be a little confused at first, but it took me around 2~3 hours before getting the hang of the mechanics.

I recommend people getting this (especially when it's on sale!).

After playing a lot more, I'd say it's a decent game and a great time killer.


Update:
Now that I've played the game over a thousand hours and have reached both rank 1 killer/survivor, I can say that this game needs lots of practice and patience.
You need at least 500+ hours to get decent at the game.

Be prepared for what you're getting into!
